teams.name: Newmarket Loves You!
teams.loan_because: It is fun, rewarding, and a great learning experience. The opportunity to work together with diverse people around the world is inspiring and uplifting for all of us, and it gives our children the chance to learn emotional intelligence and social, green capitalism where everyone wins.
teams.description: We are an eclectic family group that is spead out and enjoy giving to kiva as gifts to each other instead of another neck tie or car accessory that we don't need!
